title: Care Transitions Program Fund
description: To provide support for program development of Dr. Eric Coleman's Care Transitions Program the focus of which is to improve quality and safety during care hand-offs at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To support program development of Dr. Eric Coleman's Care Transitions Program the focus of which is to improve quality and safety during care hand-offs at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
